author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Concrete slab vapor barrier tips…I tamp the dirt and add 3 to 4 inches of gravel. Then I add StegoHome Wrap which is a 15-mil vapor barrier. It will protect the new slab from moisture instruction and the interior of the home from radon. I use StegoHome Tape to seal the Wrap against the concrete and pipes. Many thanks to Stego for providing the supplies for my client’s bathroom remodel 🔥#concreteslab #concreterepair #bathroomremodel #homeremodel #homerepairtutor
title: Concrete Slab Vapor Barrier Tips - #shorts #concreterepair #homerepairtutor
